#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,n,i,p;
	int a[100005];
	cin >>t ;
	while(t--)
	{
	cin>>n;
	int count,h,m,l;
	count=0;
	p=n;
	while(p>0)
	{
		a[count++]=p%10;
		p/=10;
	}
	for(i=2;i<n;i++)
	{
		l=0;
		m=0;
		while(l<count)
		{
			h=a[l]*i+m;
			a[l]=h%10;
			m=h/10;
			l++;
		}
		while(m>0)
		{
			a[count++]=m%10;
			m=m/10;
		}
	}
	for(i=count-1;i>=0;i--)
	cout<<a[i];
	cout<<endl;
		
	}
	return 0;
}
